Actions.Name: Acquire Access Token
Actions.Description: Authenticate with the inQuba API and receive an authorization token that will be used for all API interactions.

Actions.Name: Create Event
Actions.Description: Publish an event record to the inQuba API. A bearer token is required to interact with the API.

Actions.Name: Create Transaction
Actions.Description: Publish a transaction to the inQuba Journey API. A bearer token is required to interact with the API.
